Your Project In Safe Hands

I am a self-motivated, problem solver always seeking knowledge and learning and have excellent communication skills. My passion for business always opens new challenges to work on myself to develop my knowledge, skills, and practical experience. am capable of doing multiple tasks in a smart way, the main method I follow if you don't have then create. I believe that the great work environment starts with excited employers and a flexible chief. I am capable of doing multiple tasks in a smart way, the main method I follow if you don't have then create.

First I attended the SHETECHS program, then into Orange Coding bootcamp powered by Simplon which helped me prepare for the work environment, it contained different workshops in business and entrepreneurship, and UI & UX design, but mainly focused on coding & programming web & mobile a pps, technologies covered during boot camp are HTML, CSS, JS,React Native, React, Python, Node.js, Laravel, git, linux. Also, Familiar with Trello, Notion, Slack, discord. I had two remotely internship opportunities as a frontend developer, first, was with a Turkish startup (SiMULA) for one month, and the other with American Company (Salam App - Formerly Minder) for four months.
